title: 02/15/21 – Hour 3 – Who Has The Capital To Pull Off A Trade For Deshaun Watson?
itunes:title: 02/15/21 – Hour 3 – Who Has The Capital To Pull Off A Trade For Deshaun Watson?
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb sit in for Dan Patrick and react to a report out of San Francisco that the 49ers would only be willing to move off of Jimmy Garoppolo if they were able to trade for Deshaun Watson. The guys question which teams can realistically pull off a trade for the Texans’ prized QB and discuss Giannis Antetokounmpo’s subtle shot at the Los Angeles Lakers. Plus, Jason and Doug share their pick to come out of the Western Conference! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
